titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Printed Leaves Collection, 1475-1905
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Miranda Villesvik

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett, 2015

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Printed Leaves Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: An artificial collection of printed leaves, including leaves separated from incunabula as well as later works.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: An artificial collection of printed leaves, including leaves separated from incunabula as well as later works.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

p.archref: Francis Fitz Randolph Collection of Incunabula Leaves

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: List created by Miranda Villesvik, December 2014.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gifts and purchases from a variety of sources over a number of years.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Printed Leaves Collection, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

did.unittitle: Diogenes Laertius. Lives, Teachings, and Sayings of Famous Philosophers. Venice: Nicolas Jenson, 1475. Goff D-220.
Bible. Latin. Vulgate. Venice: Nicolas Jenson, 1476. Goff B-547.
Higden, Ranulf. Polycronicon. Westminster: William Caxton, after 1482. (Leaves CCIII, CCCXXII). Goff H-267.
Thuróczy, János. Chronica Hungarorum. Brno: Conrad Stahel and Mathias Preunlein, 1488. Goff T-360.
Dante Alighieri. Divina Commedia. Venice: Piero de Piasi, 1491. Goff D-33.
Cassiodorus. Expositio Psalmorum. Basel: Johann Amerbach, 1491. Goff C-236. (Leaves XCVIII, XXXIIII)
Schedel, Hartmann. Liber Chronicarum. Latin. Nuremberg: Anton Koberger, 1493. (Leaves CXXVI, CLXXXIX). Goff S-307.
Schedel, Hartmann. Liber Chronicarum. German. Nuremberg: Anton Koberger, 1493. (Leaves VI, XXIX, XLI, LVII-LVIII, LXX, LXXXII). Goff S-309.
Jacobus de Voragine, Golden Legend. London: Wynken de Worde; 1512?
Varronis, Cornucopiae. Venice: Aldus Manutius; 1513.
Froissart, Chronicles. 15--?
German Herbal. Late 15th early 16th?
Apocrypha. English Bible. 16th-17th Century?
Mamusse Wunneetupanatamwe Up-Biblum God… (Eliot Indian Bible). Cambridge, MA: Samuel Green, 1685.
Bauhin, Gaspad, Theatri Botanici Sive Historiae Plantarum… Basel, 1685.
Votes of the Assembly. Philadelphia: Benjamin Franklin; 1753.
The Holy Bible. Cambridge: John Baskerville, 1763.
Vitas Patrum. Hammersmith: Kelmscott Press, 1892. (Trial sheet & Prospectus).
The English Bible. (1 leaf and 2 bifolia: 19-20, 145&146-159&160, 261&262-267&268). Hammersmith: Doves Press, 1903-05.
